Package business.manager.character

Interface CharacterFacade

All Known Implementing Classes:
CharacterManager
public interface CharacterFacade
Interface that provides methods for managing characters.

  • Method Details

    • useCloudPersistence

      void useCloudPersistence() throws PersistenceException
      Uses cloud persistence for data storage.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • useLocalPersistence

      void useLocalPersistence() throws PersistenceException
      Uses local persistence for data storage.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • checkValidCharacterName

      String checkValidCharacterName(String characterName) throws InvalidCharacterNameException, CharacterNameAlreadyExistsException, PersistenceException
      Checks if the character name is valid and not already taken.
      Parameters:
      characterName - The name of the character to check.
      Returns:
      The valid character name.
      Throws:
      InvalidCharacterNameException - if the character name is invalid.
      CharacterNameAlreadyExistsException - if the character name already exists.
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • checkValidCharacterLevel

      boolean checkValidCharacterLevel(int characterLevel) throws InvalidCharacterLevelException
      Checks if the character level is valid.
      Parameters:
      characterLevel - The level of the character to check.
      Returns:
      true if the character level is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidCharacterLevelException - if the character level is invalid.

    • setInitialCharacterExperience

      int setInitialCharacterExperience(int characterLevel)
      Sets the initial experience points for a character based on their level.
      Parameters:
      characterLevel - The level of the character.
      Returns:
      The initial experience points for the character.

    • rollTwoDices

      int[] rollTwoDices()
      Rolls two dice and returns the result as an array of two integers.
      Returns:
      An array containing the results of the two dice rolls.

    • calculateStat

      int calculateStat(int dicesResult)
      Calculates a character's stat value based on the dice result.
      Parameters:
      dicesResult - The result of the dice roll.
      Returns:
      The calculated stat value.

    • updateClass

      String updateClass(String characterClass, int characterLevel) throws InvalidCharacterClassException
      Updates the character's class based on their level.
      Parameters:
      characterClass - The current class of the character.
      characterLevel - The level of the character.
      Returns:
      The updated character class.
      Throws:
      InvalidCharacterClassException - if the character class is invalid.

    • createCharacter

      void createCharacter(String characterName, String playerName, int characterExp, int bodyStat, int mindStat, int spiritStat, String characterClass) throws PersistenceException
      Creates a new character with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      characterName - The name of the character.
      playerName - The name of the player controlling the character.
      characterExp - The experience points of the character.
      bodyStat - The body stat value of the character.
      mindStat - The mind stat value of the character.
      spiritStat - The spirit stat value of the character.
      characterClass - The class of the character.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • searchCharacters

      List<Character> searchCharacters(String playerName) throws PersistenceException, NoCharactersFoundException
      Searches for characters based on the player name.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player.
      Returns:
      The list of characters belonging to the player.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.
      NoCharactersFoundException - if no characters are found for the player.

    • deleteCharacter

      void deleteCharacter(Character character) throws PersistenceException
      Deletes the specified character.
      Parameters:
      character - The character to delete.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • getCharactersAmount

      int getCharactersAmount() throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves the number of characters.
      Returns:
      The number of characters.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

      List<String> getAvailableCharacterNames() throws PersistenceException
      Gets the names of available characters.
      Returns:
      The list of available character names.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • getCharacterNameByIndex

      String getCharacterNameByIndex(int index) throws PersistenceException
      Gets the name of the character at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the character.
      Returns:
      The name of the character.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

    • setUpCharacters

      List<Character> setUpCharacters(List<Integer> indexCharacters) throws PersistenceException
      Sets up the characters for gameplay based on the specified indexes.
      Parameters:
      indexCharacters - The list of indexes of characters to set up.
      Returns:
      The list of characters for gameplay.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.

      Parameters:

      PersistenceException - if an error occurs during persistence.
